title: [Self-Directed] Designing Language Learning Strategies Using Computer Simulations

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of language structures and experience in using digital devices
context.additional_context: Blended language learning class applying hypothesis generation and complexity-regulation strategies through computer simulations

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the complexity of linguistic rules by generating and verifying multiple hypotheses in simulation environments
Learners can predict nonlinear characteristics of linguistic phenomena (e.g., irregular verb conjugations) using simulations with incremental complexity
Learners demonstrate the ability to eliminate error hypotheses with over 80% accuracy during hypothesis verification processes
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
